function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Changes in consumer behavior leading to increased purchasing of certain products","Impact":"Overstocking of certain products and strains on distribution channels","Mitigation":"Managing inventory levels, optimizing distribution networks, and forecasting demand accurately","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, demand forecasting software, and supply chain optimization tools","People":"Logistics and supply chain professionals, retailers, and distributors","Owner":"Logistics and supply chain professionals"},{"Description":"Economic and social costs associated with isolation strategies","Impact":"Increase in uncertainty about infection rates and duration of the disease","Mitigation":"Developing effective communication strategies and managing public health initiatives","Technologies":"Communication tools, data analysis software, and public health management systems","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, and government agencies","Owner":"Public health officials"},{"Description":"Increased demand for specific goods and services during the pandemic","Impact":"Strain on supply and distribution of essential goods and services","Mitigation":"Implementing mandatory sanitation measures and optimizing supply chain operations","Technologies":"Sanitation equipment, supply chain management software, and logistics automation tools","People":"Logistics and supply chain professionals, healthcare workers, and distributors","Owner":"Logistics and supply chain professionals"}]}
